page.title: 04LEISURE AT FOREST TOWN
page.content:
We live in a village called Forest Town. There are sports clubs and bowls for men. For women there is dancing and for children there are clubs and a band. Men in Forest Town go to sports clubs . Men play football, tennis, bowls and running. There are some allotments down the Avenues that people will go to every spare minute they have got.At home you can cook nice food like cakes, biscuits and pies.You could paint, draw or make things. Quite alot of people do sewing or knitting or even make clothes for their children. These are the things that we do in our spare time in Forest Town.
{STEPHEN SHAW, VIVIENNE STOW {
